password.description: If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/Thomas55555/husqvarna_automower

data.credentials: Remember Password and Username (allows this component to get a new token if it can't get renewed)

menu_options.password: Log-in with API-Key, username and password
menu_options.oauth2: Login with Authorization Code Grant (yaml requiered)

reauth_confirm.description: The Husqvarna Automower integration needs to re-authenticate with Husqvarna
reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Integration

error.auth: Make sure that the Authentication API and the Automower-Connect API is connected with your API-Key: https://developer.husqvarnagroup.cloud/ and Username/Password/API-Key are right.
error.api_key: Something is wrong with your API-Key, please renew it on https://developer.husqvarnagroup.cloud/
error.mower: Make sure that the Automower-Connect API is connected with your API-Key: https://developer.husqvarnagroup.cloud/

abort.missing_configuration: The component is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration of Husqvarna Automower is allowed.
